newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso ends lower vs dlr at 1,099.60.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso ends lower vs dlr at 1,099.60.

text.p: Colombia's peso ended 1.3 pesos lower against the dollar at 1,099.60 after a day of active trading on the country's interbank market, dealers said.
"There was a lot of movement on the market," one trader said, citing demand for dollars from the corporate sector and what he described as an influx of petrodollars late in the session.
The oil revenues helped lift the peso off its intraday low of 1,100.45, traders said, adding they saw a steady flow of dollars from the export sector lending support to the peso throughout the week.
Dealers reported 377 trades for a total of $178 million and said the peso's session high was 1,098.60. ((-- Juan Guillermo Londono, Bogota newsroom, 571 610 7944))
